attributes.action: .More funding to provide police officers on the beat on all areas of the country
attributes.additional_details:
More and more towns-- village residents and businessess are seeing their properties being put at risk brecause of redudced policing in their areas.

Crime has risen against the deterioation of front line policing - this needs to be immediatly reversed

When was the last time you saw a policeman in your neighbourhood?

 Your vote can make this change happen and put a 'Bobby' back on the beat in you area

More government funding is needed as is a physical reponse to crime at street level

Join the Feet on the Beat Campaign and help to regain our communities for the future of our children & grandchidren
